title: aDakki ALavENDum
sahitya:
aDakki ALavENDum aindu pulangaLaiyum aDakki ALavENDum maniA nI


anupallavi

  tuDukkut-tanamAgt-tuLLit-tuLLik-kudittut-tUkka viSayangaLiL sikki alaiyAmal


caraNam    Ashaiyurum poruLirp-pAsham vaikkAmal Anavap-pEuin kai aghappaTTu vizhikkAmal
nEsamellAm shivap-prakAshamAgap-pUttu nirguNa jnAnamAm porkkani pazhuttiDa
